name: typescript-nodejs-template
description: A simple template for typescript Node.js project

scripts.watch: tsc && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.build-ts: tsc && cp -r src/sslcert dist/sslcert && cp -r src/public dist/public
